attributes.action: Let all occupants of Nursing Homes (irrespective of age) enjoy licence free T.V.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The T.V. licensing authority has stipulated that all occupants under 75 years of age should pay for their own T.V. Licence. I think that this is unjust, No one wants to be in a home by choice, I have a relative with cerebal pausey under the 75 age limit.
